stories.headline: EU Leaders Hold Emergency Summit on Mediterranean Migration Surge
stories.summary: A sudden increase in migrant arrivals across the Mediterranean Sea prompts urgent talks among EU leaders to coordinate a response and resource allocation.

stories.headline: Quantum Computing Achieves Milestone in Protein Folding for Drug Design
stories.summary: Researchers announced a significant leap in using quantum computers to model complex protein structures, accelerating the drug discovery process globally.

stories.headline: Powerful Earthquake Strikes Southeast Asia, Causing Widespread Damage
stories.summary: A 7.2 magnitude earthquake hit a densely populated region, leading to significant infrastructure damage and fears of high casualties. Rescue efforts are underway.

stories.headline: Federal Reserve Hikes Interest Rates to Combat Persistent Inflation
stories.summary: The US Federal Reserve raised its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points, signaling continued efforts to cool the economy and control inflation.

stories.headline: New Vaccine Rollout Faces Logistical Hurdles Across Several African Nations
stories.summary: Efforts to distribute a critical new vaccine are hampered by infrastructure and supply chain issues, raising concerns about equitable access.
